com.wingfoot.xml.schema.types
Interface Content

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleContent, ComplexContent
public interface Content

Encapsulates the content model of a complex type. The content is either is <simpleContent> or a <complexContent>

Field Summary
static int EXTENSTION

Field Detail

RESTRICTION

Method Detail

getDerivation

public int getDerivation()
Irrespctive of the type of the content model (<simpleContent> or <complexContent>) of a complexType, the actual definition is either an extension or a restriction of a base type. The base type is either a simpleType or a complexType.

This method returns the derivation type of the Content.

Parameters:
int - the derivation type. It is either Content.RESTRICTION or Content.EXTENSION.

setBaseType

public void setBaseType(TypeReference newBaseType)
Sets the base type for the content model. A complex type is either an extension or a restriction on the some type. This method identifies that base type.
Parameters:
newBaseType - the base type being set.

getBaseType

public TypeReference getBaseType()
Returns the base type previously set.
Returns:
Type the base type.

addContent

public void addContent(Component component)
                throws SchemaException
Adds the content to the content model. Concrete implementations can decide the valid components. A SchemaException is thrown if an illegal component is passed in.

getContentList

public java.util.Vector getContentList()
Returns a List of Component(s) that encapsulates the content.
Returns:
Vector the content model; null if there is no content.

getContentCount

public int getContentCount()
Returns the number of components in the content model.
Returns:
int the number of components; 0 if the content is empty.

addContentList

public void addContentList(java.util.Vector content)
Adds a Vector of content to the content list. Any existing content is overriden.
Parameters:
content - A list of Components that constitute the content.

toXML

public void toXML(org.kxml.io.XMLWriter writer)
Converts the Content to XML.
Parameters:
writer - instance of XMLWriter to write the XML to.
